title: "Dubbing Startup CAMB.AI Raises USD 4M in Seed Round"
excerpt: "Speech translation, localization, and dubbing AI company, CAMB.AI, has raised USD 4m in a seed round from a variety of multinational investors. The funding was led by US venture capital firm Courtside Ventures and includes Singapore-based TRTL Ventures, US-based Blue Star Innovation Partners, Japan-based Ikemori Ventures, and Eisaburo Maeda."
